summary.span: 向非托管代码公开 类。

span.span: Exposes the class to unmanaged code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口是用于访问到托管类，从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。This interface is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetIDsOfNames (ref Guid riid, IntPtr rgszNames, uint cNames, uint lcid, IntPtr rgDispId);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetIDsOfNames([in]valuetype System.Guid& riid, native int rgszNames, unsigned int32 cNames, unsigned int32 lcid, native int rgDispId) cil managed
Public Sub GetIDsOfNames (ByRef riid As Guid, rgszNames As IntPtr, cNames As UInteger, lcid As UInteger, rgDispId As IntPtr)
public: void GetIDsOfNames(Guid % riid, IntPtr rgszNames, System::UInt32 cNames, System::UInt32 lcid, IntPtr rgDispId);
abstract member GetIDsOfNames : * nativeint * uint32 * uint32 * nativeint -> unit

param.name: riid
param.span: 留待将来使用。

span.span: Reserved for future use.

param.span: 必须为 IID_NULL。

span.span: Must be IID_NULL.

param.name: rgszNames
param.span: 要映射的名称的数组。

span.span: An array of names to be mapped.

param.name: cNames
param.span: 要映射的名称的计数。

span.span: The count of the names to be mapped.

param.name: lcid
param.span: 要在其中解释名称的区域设置上下文。

span.span: The locale context in which to interpret the names.

param.name: rgDispId
param.span: 调用方分配的数组，用于接收对应于这些名称的标识符。

span.span: An array allocated by the caller that receives the identifiers corresponding to the names.

summary.span: 将一组名称映射为对应的一组调度标识符。

span.span: Maps a set of names to a corresponding set of dispatch identifiers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code. 有关详细信息`IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`，请参阅 MSDN 库。For more information about `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetTypeInfo (uint iTInfo, uint lcid, IntPtr ppTInfo);

Public Sub GetTypeInfo (iTInfo As UInteger, lcid As UInteger, ppTInfo As IntPtr)
public: void GetTypeInfo(System::UInt32 iTInfo, System::UInt32 lcid, IntPtr ppTInfo);
abstract member GetTypeInfo : uint32 * uint32 * nativeint -> unit

param.name: iTInfo
param.span: 要返回的类型信息。

span.span: The type information to return.

param.name: lcid
param.span: 类型信息的区域设置标识符。

span.span: The locale identifier for the type information.

param.name: ppTInfo
param.span: 指向请求的类型信息对象的指针。

span.span: A pointer to the requested type information object.

summary.span: 检索对象的类型信息，然后可以使用该信息获取接口的类型信息。

span.span: Retrieves the type information for an object, which can be used to get the type information for an interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code. 有关详细信息`IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`，请参阅 MSDN 库。For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`, see the MSDN Library.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetTypeInfoCount (out uint pcTInfo);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetTypeInfoCount([out] unsigned int32& pcTInfo) cil managed
Public Sub GetTypeInfoCount (ByRef pcTInfo As UInteger)
public: void GetTypeInfoCount([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::UInt32 % pcTInfo);
abstract member GetTypeInfoCount : -> unit

param.name: pcTInfo
param.span: 此方法返回时包含一个用于接收对象提供的类型信息接口数量的位置指针。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a location that receives the number of type information interfaces provided by the object.

param.span: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 检索对象提供的类型信息接口的数量（0 或 1）。

span.span: Retrieves the number of type information interfaces that an object provides (either 0 or 1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code. 有关详细信息`IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`，请参阅 MSDN 库。For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`, see the MSDN Library.

abstract member Invoke : uint32 * * uint32 * int16 * nativeint * nativeint * nativeint * nativeint -> unit

param.name: dispIdMember
param.span: 成员的标识符。

span.span: An identifier of a member.

param.name: riid
param.span: 留待将来使用。

span.span: Reserved for future use.

param.span: 必须为 IID_NULL。

span.span: Must be IID_NULL.

param.name: lcid
param.span: 要在其中解释参数的区域设置上下文。

span.span: The locale context in which to interpret arguments.

param.name: wFlags
param.span: 描述调用的上下文的标志。

span.span: Flags describing the context of the call.

param.name: pDispParams
param.span: 指向一个结构的指针，该结构包含一个自变量数组、一个命名自变量的 DISPID 自变量数组和数组中元素数的计数。

span.span: A pointer to a structure containing an array of arguments, an array of argument DISPIDs for named arguments, and counts for the number of elements in the arrays.

param.name: pVarResult
param.span: 指向结果存储位置的指针。

span.span: A pointer to the location where the result will be stored.

param.name: pExcepInfo
param.span: 指向一个包含异常信息的结构的指针。

span.span: A pointer to a structure that contains exception information.

param.name: puArgErr
param.span: 第一个出错自变量的索引。

span.span: The index of the first argument that has an error.

summary.span: 提供对某一对象公开的属性和方法的访问。

span.span: Provides access to properties and methods exposed by an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code. 有关详细信息`IDispatch::Invoke`，请参阅 MSDN 库。For more information about `IDispatch::Invoke`, see the MSDN Library.
